Title: All Autoequivalences are Spherical Twists
Abstract: © The Author(s) 2017. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.In this short note, we observe that, for purely formal reasons, any autoequivalence can be constructed as a twist around a spherical functor. As an example, we show how the P-twists constructed by Huybrechts and Thomas can be formulated as spherical twists.
